item.title: Need help with training area error! please!
item.dc:creator: @keepitreal keepitreal
item.description:
@keepitreal wrote:

hello well i have added my statue of saradim in falador wishin i can train on it on my server but i get 100 errors once i compile
i add the statue by using this:
makeGlobalObject(3036, 3356, 11701, 0, 10); //statue of saradim

and try and get it trainable using this:

case 1536:
if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train attack!”);
actionTimer = 53;
addSkillXP((3000*playerLevel[0]), 0);
}
break;

i add this all to client.java by the way and i go compile the get errors
what rong with it !
please someone help
thankyou!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with training area error! please!
